001package edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.controller;
002
003import android.app.Dialog;
004import android.content.DialogInterface;
005import android.os.Bundle;
006import android.text.Editable;
007import android.text.TextWatcher;
008import android.view.LayoutInflater;
009import android.view.View;
010import android.view.ViewGroup;
011import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
012import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
013import androidx.appcompat.app.AlertDialog;
014import androidx.appcompat.app.AlertDialog.Builder;
015import androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment;
016import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
017import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
018import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.R;
020import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.databinding.FragmentEditPassphraseBinding;
021import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.model.Passphrase;
022import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.viewmodel.PassphraseViewModel;
023import java.util.regex.Pattern;
024import java.util.stream.Collectors;
025import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
026
027public class EditPassphraseFragment extends DialogFragment implements TextWatcher {
028
029  private static final Pattern SPLITTER = Pattern.compile("\\W+");
030  private FragmentEditPassphraseBinding binding;
031  private String key;
032  private AlertDialog dialog;
033  private PassphraseViewModel viewModel;
034  private Passphrase passphrase;
035
036  @NonNull
037  @Override
038  public Dialog onCreateDialog(@Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
039    binding = FragmentEditPassphraseBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater(), null, false);
040    key = EditPassphraseFragmentArgs.fromBundle(getArguments()).getKey();
041    dialog = new Builder(requireContext())
042        //.setIcon() // TODO: 11/3/23 Import a suitable icon drawable.
043        .setTitle(R.string.passphrase_details)
044        .setView(binding.getRoot())
045        .setPositiveButton(android.R.string.ok, (dlg, which) -> save())
046        .setNegativeButton(android.R.string.cancel, (dlg, which) -> {/*Do nothing.*/})
047        .create();
048    dialog.setOnShowListener((dlg) -> checkSubmitConditions());
049    binding.name.addTextChangedListener(this);
050    binding.words.addTextChangedListener(this);
051    binding.generate.setOnClickListener((v) -> viewModel.generate(binding.length.getValue()));
052    binding.length.setMinValue(2); // FIXME: 11/3/23 Read from resources.
053    binding.length.setMaxValue(10);// FIXME: 11/3/23 Read from resources.
054    return dialog;
055
056  }
057
058  @Nullable
059  @Override
060  public View onCreateView(@NonNull @NotNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container,
061      @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
062    return binding.getRoot();
063  }
064
065  @Override
066  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull @NotNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
067    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
068    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity())
069        .get(PassphraseViewModel.class);
070    viewModel.clearGenerated();
071    viewModel
072        .getGenerated()
073        .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(),
074            (words) -> binding.words.setText((words != null) ? String.join("\n", words) : ""));
075    passphrase = new Passphrase();
076    viewModel.clearPassphrase();
077    if(key != null){
078      viewModel
079          .getPassphrase()
080          .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), passphrase -> {
081            if(passphrase != null){
082              binding.name.setText(passphrase.getName());
083              binding.words.setText(String.join("\n",passphrase.getWords()));
084              this.passphrase = passphrase;
085            }
086          });
087      viewModel.fetch(key);
088    }
089  }
090
091  @Override
092  public void onDestroyView() {
093    binding = null;
094    super.onDestroyView();
095  }
096
097  @Override
098  public void beforeTextChanged(CharSequence s, int start, int count, int after) {
099    // Do nothing.
100  }
101
102  @Override
103  public void onTextChanged(CharSequence s, int start, int before, int count) {
104  // Do nothing.
105  }
106
107  @Override
108  public void afterTextChanged(Editable s) {
109    checkSubmitConditions();
110  }
111
112private void save(){
113  //noinspection DataFlowIssue
114  passphrase.setName(binding.name.getText().toString().strip());
115  //passphrase.getWords().addAll(
116  // noinspection DataFlowIssue
117  passphrase.clear();
118        SPLITTER
119            .splitAsStream(binding.words.getText().toString())
120            .filter((word) -> !word.isEmpty())
121            .forEach((word) -> passphrase.append(word));
122            //.collect(Collectors.toList()) this is another option to replaces the line forEach.
123    viewModel.save(passphrase);
124  // TODO: 11/6/23 Wait for a successful response.
125}
126  private void checkSubmitConditions() {
127    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
128    dialog.getButton(DialogInterface.BUTTON_POSITIVE)
129        .setEnabled(
130            !binding.name.getText().toString().isBlank()
131            && !binding.words.getText().toString().isBlank()
132        );
133  }
134}
